posts.post_content:
There is some glue/scrapbook remnant on the back and an odd factory cut on the left border that would prevent it from grading higher than an SGC 10, but this card has about as crisp and clear a photo as you will find on an Old Judge card.

$300 delivered.

Will also consider trades for any 1888 Kansas City Blues player or a card of Bushong, Collins, Crane, Duffe, Earle, Ebright, Gilmore, Hafner, Hoover, Hornung, O'Brien, Phillips, Quinn or Schriver.
